entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:19 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 41.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 41. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 37 by morning.
